actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to provide for Senate confirmation of certain appointments.

summary.text: Federal Reserve Act Amendments - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to require, beginning February 1, 1982 the Chairman and Vice Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System when appointed by the President, whether for a new term or to fill a vacancy in an unexpired term, to be confirmed by the Senate.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to provide for Senate confirmation of certain appointments.
